result.pre: soil moisture level of 25% water holding capacity. Due to its ability to tolerate drought stress,

result.name: binomial

result.pre: It is recommended that management strategies for
result.post: should include early control of this weed in cropping fields, because the combined pressure of enh
result.name: binomial

result.pre: tion and water stress conditions could severely impair crop yield. Thus it is important to control
result.post: at the earliest possible time in order to conserve soil moisture for crops where possible.
